abstract: King Salman of Saudi Arabia, putting his personal imprint on nation, issues sweeping royal decrees that reward some in his government with bonuses and others with dismissals from their posts.
lead_paragraph: Despite concern that a steep decline in oil prices would restrict the country’s finances, King Salman also decreed a cash bonus worth two months' salary to government employees, students and pensioners.
snippet: Despite concern that a steep decline in oil prices would restrict the country’s finances, King Salman also decreed a cash bonus worth two months' salary to government employees, students and pensioners.

headline.main: Saudi King Hands Out Pink Slips and Bonuses
headline.print_headline: Saudi King Hands Out Pink Slips and Bonuses
